```{r goose_timeseries}
#'for flocksize
#'start the time series at 2001.75, as in october 2001, 3/4 of the
#'year is done
goose_ts = ts(goose_time_merge[,c(3,4)], start = c(2001.75,1),
              frequency = 365)

#'plot to check
#plot(goose_ts)
```

```{r goose_ts_decomp}
#'seasonal decomposition
#'flock size
flock_stl = stl(goose_ts[,1], s.window = "periodic", na.action = na.omit)

#'juvprop
juv_stl = stl(goose_ts[,2], s.window = "periodic",na.action = na.omit)

#'cbind
goose_stl = cbind(flock_stl, juv_stl, time = day_seq)
```
